title: Does the Hope's Lord refuse to close the options with a need for a message from God?
subtitle: It is reported that the Hopi lobby sent a letter to the staff explaining that its warehouses were open during the outbreak of the COVID-19 epidemic because the wife of Executive Director David Greene received partial assurances from God.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The Executive Director of the Hobby David Green refuses to close down the stores during the COVID-19 epidemic because his wife, Barbara, received a message from God that the staff would remain safe.
